response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I am confident it would be a valuable addition to your endeavors. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This price represents a strategic compromise between the intrinsic value of the product and my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. I am here to answer any questions you might have and assist you in making an informed decision.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
